newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australia sees rise in Malaysia meat exports.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australia sees rise in Malaysia meat exports.

text.p: Australian exports of chilled beef and veal to Malaysia are expected to climb to as much as 400 tonnes this year from 332 tonnes in 1995, the Australian Meat & Livestock Corp (AMLC) said on Tuesday.

Australian exports of non-loin meats are also forecast to rise as the cuts gain greater acceptance in the Malyasian retail sector, Rose Young, managing director of the AMLC's Malaysia operations told Reuters.
"We're seeing more use of non-loins in traditional Malaysian diets, much of which is based on rice," Yong said.
